data.text:
@JohnBoozman Voting Against American Citizens #JohnBoozman 
Pass the SAVE ACT
@JohnBoozman End the zombie filibuster, Stop sending billions of dollars to democrat NGO's that support illegal immigrants, Pass the SAVE Act.

@JohnBoozman @JohnBoozman what are you talking about?  Funding fraud for refugees that you vote for?  The prison that Sarah Huckabee is push through like a train that has derailed or the wreckage and non America way you vote? https://t.co/Ax7vhiE5N4
@JohnBoozman We need your support of the SAVE act. Please represent your constituents and help get it to the house floor.
@JohnBoozman You need to address your people and answer why you choose to vote against us .
@JohnBoozman You vote with Democrats too often.
@JohnBoozman Please Help Iran 🙏🏻 Dictatorships don’t reform, they entrench. If the U.S. doesn’t act now and permanently eliminate the Islamic regime, Iran risks becoming the next North Korea.
@JohnBoozman You voted to give illegals welfare. Tell us about your “smurfing.”
